trans-unit.source: Tracks outstanding handles and forces a garbage collection when the specified threshold is reached.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪未完成的句柄并在达到指定阈值时强制实施垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector> class keeps track of a limited number of handles to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector>类将跟踪的有限的数量的非托管资源的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Typically, unmanaged resources include handles to `HDC`s, `HWnd`s, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 通常，非托管的资源包括的句柄`HDC`s， `HWnd`s，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: A name for the collector.
trans-unit.target: 收集器的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter allows you to name collectors that track handle types separately.
trans-unit.target: 此参数允许你为跟踪图柄类型的收集器分别命名。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the point at which collections should begin.
trans-unit.target: 指定何时开始执行回收的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> class using a name and a threshold at which to begin handle collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个名称以及一个阈值（在达到该值时开始执行图柄回收）初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> 参数小于 0。

trans-unit.source: A name for the collector.
trans-unit.target: 收集器的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter allows you to name collectors that track handle types separately.
trans-unit.target: 此参数允许你为跟踪图柄类型的收集器分别命名。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the point at which collections should begin.
trans-unit.target: 指定何时开始执行回收的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the point at which collections must occur.
trans-unit.target: 指定必须开始进行回收的时间的值。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to the maximum number of available handles.
trans-unit.target: 此值应设置为可用图柄的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> class using a name, a threshold at which to begin handle collection, and a threshold at which handle collection must occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个名称、一个指定何时开始执行图柄回收的阈值，以及一个指定必须进行图柄回收的时间的阈值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> 参数小于 0。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maximumThreshold" /> parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maximumThreshold" /> 参数小于 0。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="maximumThreshold" /> parameter is less than the <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maximumThreshold" /> 参数小于 <paramref name="initialThreshold" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: Increments the current handle count.
trans-unit.target: 增加当前图柄计数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Count" /> property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Count" /> 属性小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of handles collected.
trans-unit.target: 获取回收的图柄的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of handles collected.
trans-unit.target: 回收的句柄的数量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the point at which collections should begin.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定了何时开始执行回收。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the point at which collections should begin.
trans-unit.target: 指定何时开始执行回收的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the point at which collections must occur.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定必须开始进行回收的时间的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the point at which collections must occur.
trans-unit.target: 指定必须开始进行回收的时间的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector" /> 对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Name" /> property allows you to name collectors that track handle types separately.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Name" /> 属性允许您为跟踪句柄类型的回收器分别命名。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the current handle count.
trans-unit.target: 减少当前图柄计数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Count" /> property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollector.Count" /> 属性小于 0。
